description: woman's jacket; colored batik on sleeves, shoulders and up back in blue, pink, gold, white; blue and white batik on lower fronts; front edge and neck have wide embroidered tape with appliqued border; cotton print inset on front; multicolored embroidered square at center back; long back tail embroidered with horizontal geoemtric cross stitch patterns--in between is wide silk embroidered section in white, red, yellow and green; tail has black binding on all sides
title: Jacket
